    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f44208f4a1ef4fc5701cea8a13f59bbfdcf6994a</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f44208f4a1ef4fc5701cea8a13f59bbfdcf6994a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Standard enthalpy change of  formation for water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Standardenthalpieänderung der Anordnung für 
Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement standard d'enthalpie de formation pour
l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança padrão do enthalpy da formação para a
água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento standard di entalpia di formazione 
per acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπη αλλαγή ενθαλπίας του σχηματισμού για το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio estándar de la entalpia de la formación 
para el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of water and its standard enthalpy change. The reaction is exothermic as 286 kJ/mol is lost from the system to the surroundings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standard enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung des Wassers 
und seiner Standardenthalpieänderung. Die Reaktion ist 
exothermisch, da 286 kJ/mol vom System zu den Umlagerungen verloren 
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation de l'eau 
et de son changement standard d'enthalpie. La réaction est 
exothermique car 286 kJ/mol sont détruits du système aux 
environnements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação da água e 
de sua mudança padrão do enthalpy. A reação é exothermic 
porque 286 kJ/mol são perdidos do sistema aos arredors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione di 
acqua e del relativo cambiamento standard di entalpia. La 
reazione è esotermica poichè 286 kJ/mol sono persi dal sistema ai 
dintorni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό του ύδατος 
και της πρότυπης αλλαγής ενθαλπίας της. Η αντίδραση είναι 
εξωθερμική όπως 286 kJ/to μορ. χάνονται από το σύστημα στα 
περίχωρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación del agua 
y de su cambio estándar de la entalpia. La reacción es 
exotérmica pues 286 kJ/mol se pierden del sistema a los alrededores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Standardenthalpieänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydrogène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement standard d'enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hidrogênio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança padrão do enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">idrogeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento standard di entalpia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρότυπη αλλαγή ενθαλπίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
